_header: If it be so that ye so cruel be
_description: A love complaint — five stanzas rhyme royal adapted from Chaucer’s Troilus and Criseyde (5248): Book II: 337-51, 778-84, 785-91, 855-61

BLAdd17492.First Lines:
yff yt be so that ye so creuel bethat off my death yow lysteth
                    nowght to retch…
BLAdd17492.Last Lines:
…dyffamen loue as nothyng off hym knowethey speken but they
                    bente never hys bowe
